title: #578: The Secret Plan To Bring America Back Into The British Empire with Richard Grove
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Richard Grove back to the show for easily one of our best episodes ever.   We dive deep into the British Empire's secret plan to bring America to its knees and back under control of the British Elites.  We go deep on the total banger.  Thank you for your support.

With BudVac's storage jars — you'll be able to taste, smell, and feel the difference! Go to BudVac.com and use promo code TFH at checkout for a 10% discount!
